sentences.english: And he made bars of setim wood, which he overlaid with gold.
sentences.chinese: 又用皂荚木做了杠杆，包上了金。

sentences.english: And he made boards for the tabernacle of shittim wood， standing up.
sentences.chinese: 他用皂荚木作帐幕的竖板。

sentences.english: Then make poles of acacia wood and overlay them with gold.
sentences.chinese: 要用皂荚木做两根贡，用金包裹。

sentences.english: Make the poles of acacia wood and overlay them with gold.
sentences.chinese: 要用皂荚木作杠，用金包裹。

sentences.english: He made also bars of setim wood, five to hold together the boards of one side of the tabernacle.
sentences.chinese: 又用皂荚木做了横木为帐棚这一面木板做了五根。

sentences.english: The poles for carrying the table were made of acacia wood and were overlaid with gold.
sentences.chinese: 他用皂荚木做两根杠，用金包裹，以便抬桌子。

sentences.english: Make poles of acacia wood for the altar and overlay them with bronze.
sentences.chinese: 又要为祭坛做杠，就是皂荚木的杠，要包上铜。

sentences.english: Make rods of the same wood, plated with gold, for lifting the table.
sentences.chinese: 要用皂荚木做两根杠，用金包裹，以便抬桌子。

sentences.english: Make an altar of acacia wood for burning incense.
sentences.chinese: 你要用皂荚木做一座烧香的坛。

sentences.english: They made the poles of acacia wood and overlaid them with bronze.
sentences.chinese: 用皂荚木做杠，用铜包裹。

sentences.english: They made upright frames of acacia wood for the tabernacle.
sentences.chinese: 他用皂荚木做帐幕的竖板。

sentences.english: Thou shalt make also an altar to burn incense, of setim wood.
sentences.chinese: 你应做焚香的坛，用皂荚木制造。

sentences.english: Make the poles of acacia wood, overlay them with gold and carry the table with them.
sentences.chinese: 要用皂荚木做两根贡，用金包裹，以便抬桌子。

sentences.english: Thou shalt make also the boards of the tabernacle standing upright of setim wood.
sentences.chinese: 应用皂荚木做支帐棚用的木板。

definition: Sapindales/order of scented bushes and trees, includes citrus fruit and lychee
mulberry tree, with leaves used to feed silkworms
Acorus calamus/sweet sedge or sweet flag
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
